## Team Directory Component Demo
This demonstrates the new TeamDirectory block with the Comm360 team members. Click on team members to see their details and explore the team structure.

## How to Use
- **Grid View**: See all team members at a glance - **Detail View**: Click on any member to see their full profile - **Navigation**: Use the view toggle buttons or click members directly
This component can be customized with different team data for various SBAs.

### Team Hierarchy
- **CEO**: Anne Hastings (makes ultimate decisions) - **Supervisor/Mentor**: Lianne Park (presents to PDE committee) - **Intern Teammates**: Ty, Peggy, and Lacy
